Keywords: Excalibur , Mystical , Ruler , Scientist , Warrior
Real Name: Brian Braddock
Special Powers
(+5 POINTS) SWORD BEARER: This character starts the game with any Sword equipment equipped.
TOUGHER THAN OTHERWORLD: When a friendly character makes a close attack, that character can use Toughness until your next turn.
TENACITY, ALWAYS: Combat Reflexes. // When an opposing character moves adjacent to Captain Avalon when using Charge or Hypersonic Speed, after resolutions deal them 1 damage.
